description: This Grafana dashboard showcases Hgraph's open-source methodologies for Hedera Stats analytics, with easy access provided through our GraphQL API.

options.content:
This Grafana dashboard showcases Hgraph's open-source methodologies for Hedera Stats analytics, with easy access provided through our GraphQL API.

 Documentation & examples üëã

panels.description: Combinations of various statistics can provide deeper insights. This visualization shows Network Fees, Active Accounts, Active Smart Contracts and New Transactions. It also shows Fees per Active Account.

targets.root_selector: data.metric.({ "total": total/100000000, "end_date": end_date })
data.metric.({ "total": total, "end_date": end_date })
data.metric.({ "total": total/100000, "end_date": end_date })
data.metric.({ "total": total, "end_date": end_date })
data.metric.({ "total": total, "end_date": end_date })

panels.title: Network Activity Overview

options.content:
Network Performance

Foundational statistics to understand network traffic and vitals via transaction fees. Learn more ‚Üí

panels.description: Hedera accounts are created with either an ECDSA key or an Ed25519 key. This visualization shows the breakdown for all-time total accounts on Hedera.
panels.title: Total Accounts (Key Type)

panels.description: This visualization shows Active Developer Accounts, Active Retail Accounts and Active Smart Contracts. This shows how combining stats can provide better insights.

About Hedera Stats

Deep insights based on open-source methodologies. Powered by Hgraph ‚Üí

This dashboard is a demo of how this data, leveraging open-source methodologies, can be used. Hedera Stats shows key network metrics‚Äîfees, active accounts, TVL, and economic activity‚Äîin an easy-to-read format. Built by Hgraph, this dashbard demonstrates the power of these Hedera Stats endpoints. Access the data via Hgraph's GraphQL API. Sign up for a free account and check the Hedera Stats documentation for methodologies and code examples.

Tip: Click a heading like > ‚ò∞ Active Accounts to expand the chart and metrics.

This Grafana dashboard showcases Hgraph's open-source methodologies for Hedera Stats analytics, with easy access provided through our GraphQL API.

 Documentation & examples üëã
